issue.title: [C#] Add support for decimals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11422](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11422). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The C# client does not yet support decimals

comments.body:
